data.comment: Today's referee, Marco Piccinini, has blown to start the match.
Romelu Lukaku puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 1, Great play from Achraf Hakimi to set up the goal.
Can Benevento get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Inter's half?
Free kick for Benevento in the half of Inter.
In the minute 5, Throw-in high up the field for Benevento in Benevento.
Throw-in for Inter at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Benevento's Roberto Insigne breaks free at Stadio Ciro Vigorito. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the away team in Benevento.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Gabriele Moncini of Benevento is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 10, Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Inter.
In Benevento Inter attack through Alexis Sanchez. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 13, Marco Piccinini awards Benevento a goal kick.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Benevento push upfield and Artur Ionita gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Inter defence.
In the minute 14, Important block from the Benevento defence as Achraf Hakimi fires in a strike for Inter.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Benevento.
In the minute 17, Inter's Achraf Hakimi is whistled for offside at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Benevento have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Inter in the half of Benevento.
In the minute 21, Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Marco Piccinini awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
In the minute 25, Goal! Inter extend their lead to 0-2 through Roberto Gagliardini.
Ashley Young instrumental with a fine assist.
Ashley Young for Inter gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Benevento at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Inter's Arturo Vidal gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
In the minute 28, Great finish from Romelu Lukaku to give Inter a 0-3 lead.
Roberto Gagliardini with an assist there.
In Benevento a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 30, Stefano Sensi for Inter drives towards goal at Stadio Ciro Vigorito. But the finish is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Inter at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
In the minute 34, Goal! Gianluca Caprari pulls one back to make it 1-3.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Benevento.
Inter have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, The match at Stadio Ciro Vigorito has been interrupted briefly for a check on Federico Barba, who is down injured.
Filippo Inzaghi (Benevento) is making a first change, with Gaetano Letizia replacing the possibly injured Federico Barba.
Attention is being given to Benevento’s Christian Maggio and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 39, Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Benevento a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Benevento's Christian Maggio looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 41, Benevento surge into the attack at Stadio Ciro Vigorito but Kamil Glik’s header is off-target.
Marco Piccinini awards Inter a goal kick.
Free kick for Inter in their own half.
In the minute 42, Goal! Achraf Hakimi extends Inter's lead to 1-4.
Free kick Inter.
Free kick for Benevento in the half of Inter.
In the minute 44, Can Benevento capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Inter's half?
Inter attack but Arturo Vidal's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Benevento.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Benevento awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Inter to take a throw-in in Benevento territory.
In the minute 45, Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Inter.
The first-half is over.
Marco Piccinini has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Filippo Inzaghi is making the team's second substitution at Stadio Ciro Vigorito with Daam Foulon replacing Christian Maggio.
Alessandro Tuia is replacing Roberto Insigne for Benevento at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Benevento have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Gabriele Moncini (Benevento) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Inter have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Benevento a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Marco Piccinini signals a Benevento throw-in in Inter's half.
In the minute 52, The away team have replaced Arturo Vidal with Nicolo Barella. This is the first substitution made today by Antonio Conte.
Benevento's Kamil Glik is on target but unsuccessful.
In Benevento Inter's Alexis Sanchez is caught offside.
In the minute 55, Throw-in Inter.
Corner awarded to Benevento.
Free kick for Inter in their own half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Benevento in their own half.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Benevento.
Benevento have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Inter at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Inter in the half of Benevento.
In the minute 63, Free kick Inter.
Filippo Inzaghi (Benevento) is making a fourth substitution, with Gianluca Lapadula replacing Gabriele Moncini.
In Benevento Benevento drive forward through Gaetano Letizia. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 65, Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula breaks free at Stadio Ciro Vigorito. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Inter at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Lautaro Martinez is replacing Romelu Lukaku for the away team.
In the minute 65, The away team replace Stefano Sensi with Marcelo Brozovic.
Ivan Perisic is on a sub for Ashley Young for Inter.
Throw-in for Inter in their own half.
In the minute 67, Marco Piccinini awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Inter is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, Roberto Gagliardini (Inter) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
The home team have replaced Bryan Dabo with Perparim Hetemaj. This is the fifth substitution made today by Filippo Inzaghi.
Benevento needs to be cautious. Inter have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 71, Throw-in Benevento.
It's now 1-5 in Benevento as Lautaro Martinez scores for Inter.
That's a fine assist from Alexis Sanchez.
In the minute 73, Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Pasquale Schiattarella is booked for the home team.
Alexis Sanchez (Inter) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 74, Nicolo Barella (Inter) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lautaro Martinez for Inter is whistled offside.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Benevento.
In the minute 76, Gianluca Caprari puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-5.
Gianluca Lapadula with an assist there.
Inter are coming forward and Ivan Perisic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 78, Marco Piccinini awards Benevento a goal kick.
Inter to take a throw-in in Benevento territory.
Alexis Sanchez of Inter smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 80, Marco Piccinini waits before resuming play because Pasquale Schiattarella for Benevento is still down.
Pasquale Schiattarella is back on his feet again.
Christian Eriksen is replacing Roberto Gagliardini for Inter at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
In the minute 82, Inter's Nicolo Barella misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
Inter awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in Benevento.
Throw-in for Inter in their own half.
Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Ciro Vigorito. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 86, Inter's Christian Eriksen gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Benevento defender.
In Benevento a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Benevento.
In the minute 88, Kamil Glik of Benevento gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Inter at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Christian Eriksen (Inter) strikes – and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Inter have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Free kick Benevento.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
That's full-time at Stadio Ciro Vigorito. The final score is 2-5.
